org.gridfour.gvrs

Interface ITilePositionIndex


  • public interface ITilePositionIndex

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      int getCountOfPopulatedTiles()
      Gets the count of the number of tiles that are currently populated.

      Gets the file position for the specified tile.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilePosition

        long getFilePosition(int tileIndex)
        Gets the file position for the specified tile.
        Parameters:
        tileIndex - a positive integer
        Returns:
        if found, a value greater than zero; otherwise, zero.

      • getStorageSize

        int getStorageSize()
        Gets the amount of storage space required to store the tile index, in bytes.
        Returns:
        a positive value, in bytes.

      • isFilePositionSet

        boolean isFilePositionSet(int tileIndex)
        Indicates whether a file position is set for the specified tile index.
        Parameters:
        tileIndex - a positive integer
        Returns:
        true if a valid file position is stored for a tile; otherwise, false

      • readTilePositions

        void readTilePositions(BufferedRandomAccessFile braf)
                throws IOException
        Reads the tile position data from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        braf - a valid file reference
        Throws:
        IOException - in the event of an unhandled I/O exception.

      • setFilePosition

        void setFilePosition(int tileIndex,
                     long offset)
        Store the specified offset at the position given by the tile row and column. If necessary, the index is resized to accommodate the specified coordinates.

        File positions must be positive values and a multiple of eight.

        Parameters:
        tileIndex - the index of the tile to be stored.
        offset - the file position, in bytes.

      • writeTilePositions

        void writeTilePositions(BufferedRandomAccessFile braf)
                 throws IOException
        Writes the tile position data from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        braf - a valid file reference
        Throws:
        IOException - in the event of an unhandled I/O exception.

      • getCountOfPopulatedTiles

        int getCountOfPopulatedTiles()
        Gets the count of the number of tiles that are currently populated. This count does not include tiles that may have been written to, but are still being retained in the tile cache and so have not yet been committed to the output file.
        Returns:
        a positive integer.
